showerReviews.reviewText: Held our son's birthday party here in the meeting/conference rooms and it was perfect for the occasion. Great location, clean facility, friendly staff. Great views over looking the park nearby. We had roughly 50 guests total and it was still very roomy, did not feel crowded. Highly recommend!
The equipment is clean and in great shape. The crowd is friendly and the hours flexible. Let’s get in shape!

I rented a room for small baby shower.  We used their projector to Zoom in several other people.  The facility and the staff were great.  Ryan was super to work with--accessible, knowledgeable, and very helpful, especially in these Covid …

We attended a trivia night in the lower level of the community center. Large facility. They protected the gymnasium floor and it was easy to walk on. Lots of electrical outlets. Lots of exercise equipment. Shower facilities in lower level. Only two restroom stalls for women. Clean. Friendly staff to greet you.

I went here to see a magic show. The magic show was pretty good. I did not utilize much of the community center other than to have my kids use the restroom and see the show, but the staff at the community center were certainly friendly and accommodating.

showerReviews.reviewText: Excellent gym and workout place. The place is clean, not too crowded and had array of equipments. The basketball court, indoor and outdoor pool and variety of aerobics, spinning classes make it real fun place to be. We tried two nearby …

The workers are very nice and helpful. But its hard to navigate the place if you haven't been there before and the shower doesn't show which way to turn for hot vs cold water. The swim area doesn't have a play area for small children. The swimsuit spinner machine was out of order.

Unlike the YMCA and the Lodge of Des Peres, the J provides towels (Large Ones), shampoo, body wash, conditioner, etc. The water pressure that comes out of the shower heads is simply amazing. Literally your cleaned from head to toe within 2 …

What a pleasure to visit the J!! My mom is a member and I came in as a guest (I live out of town). The facility is super clean and the equipment is well maintained and current. I took a spin class with Alana that was every bit as …

Very clean facility and professional staff. Both locations are excellent but I now prefer Chesterfield bc it’s less crowded which is important during the pandemic. Right now the mask policy requires masks when not working out and there is …

showerReviews.reviewText: I was at the Rec Center for a baby shower in one of the party rooms. The facility was nice. I have been in the same party room for 2 parties and both times the temperature in the room was too hot. The parking lot was a mess when I was there …

Attended baby shower there. It was nice enough. They had a kitchen area to prepare food. Fridge and I think ice machine.

showerReviews.reviewText: Fun day floating on the lazy river. Great friendly staff, clean water and all the area around. Wish there had been more floats as we were feeling like we needed to get out so others could enjoy. We will be back

Love this pool. Bought a season pass over last winter for this summer and it was well worth it! Always enough chairs available, pool is typically clean (only one day when there was a ton of tiny bugs all over the pools, probably after a …

Exceptionally clean! The food was served immediately after my order was placed! There was several, friendly, lifeguards fully alert for the safety of my family and everyone inside the park. I am happy to state that I will be bringing more family members back for more fun in the near future!!
